subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: The American Tejay van Garderen pulled away on the final uphill climb in snow and fog to win the fourth stage of the Volta a Catalunya in Spain, while Joaquim Rodríguez kept the lead.
snippet: The American Tejay van Garderen pulled away on the final uphill climb in snow and fog to win the fourth stage of the Volta a Catalunya in Spain, while Joaquim Rodríguez kept the lead.
